about.title: Introduction
about.subTitle: Overview.
about.content: Hi there! I'm a Web Developer and Photo Editor with strong experience in frameworks like FastAPI, Flask, and React. I specialize in creating modern and responsive web applications and interfaces using React and other web technologies. My skill set also includes web scraping with Scrapy, data analysis with Pandas, big data processing with PySpark, and basic Golang development. I'm proficient in utilizing Large Language Models (LLMs) for AI-assisted development and have deep experience as an LLM power user. Additionally, I offer professional photo editing services. I'm continuously growing as a Full Stack Developer and creative professional. Feel free to connect and discuss with me!

experience.title: What I have done so far
experience.subTitle: Work Experience.

0.title: Web Developer
points: Building responsive websites using **Next.js**, **React**, and **TailwindCSS**
Deploying projects on **Vercel**, **Netlify**, and **GitHub Pages**
Experience in SEO optimization and website performance improvements
Creating modern, mobile-friendly UI/UX designs
Technologies: **Next.js**, **React**, **TailwindCSS**, **Vercel**

1.title: Professional Photo Editor
points: Expert in **photo retouching**, background removal, and color correction
Using **Photoshop**, **Lightroom**, and **Canva** for high-end editing
Designing social media posts, banners, and promotional content
Delivering high-quality edits for personal and business clients
Technologies: **Photoshop**, **Lightroom**, **Illustrator**, **Canva**

2.title: Backend
points: Developed small backend projects using **FastAPI** and **Flask**
Basic understanding of **MongoDB**, **Firebase**, and **PostgreSQL**
Built simple APIs and handled database CRUD operations
Experience with authentication, JWT, and REST APIs
Technologies: **FastAPI**, **Flask**, **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**

3.title: AI Tools Explorer
points: Exploring AI tools like **ChatGPT**, **MidJourney**, and **Leonardo AI**
Integrating OpenAI APIs into basic automation and chatbot projects
Generating AI content for blogs, designs, and coding help
Experimenting with image generation and AI-driven art tools
Technologies: **OpenAI API**, **ChatGPT**, **MidJourney**, **Leonardo AI**

4.title: Python Developer (Self-Learning)
points: Strong knowledge of **Python** scripting and automation tasks
Experience with web scraping using **Selenium** and **BeautifulSoup**
Built small automation bots for web tasks and data collection
Good understanding of **OOP**, **APIs**, and basic data structures
Technologies: **Python**, **Selenium**, **BeautifulSoup**, **Pandas**

work.title: MY WORK
work.subTitle: Projects.
work.content: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos in it. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.

0.name: React Developer Portfolio
0.description: This project showcases a personal portfolio built with React, demonstrating the skills and expertise in front-end development. The portfolio highlights various projects, provides a clean and responsive design, and uses modern web technologies to offer a seamless user experience.

1.name: AI Assistant
1.description: This project demonstrates the power of AI in providing intelligent assistance. The AI Assistant uses natural language processing and machine learning algorithms to understand user queries and provide accurate responses. It's designed to improve productivity and enhance user experience by integrating with various platforms and offering smart solutions for different tasks.

2.name: React Developer Portfolio
2.description: A professional React Developer portfolio that presents a comprehensive overview of my web development work. This portfolio features an interactive UI, optimized for performance, and integrates various React features to create a dynamic and user-friendly experience for potential clients and employers.

blog.title: MY ALBUM
blog.subTitle: MEMRIES.
